location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Lee Warner, Agra to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter asking Pelly to inform Lieutenant Charles Edward Yate that the position for which he had applied had not yet been created but that he would be put forward for it should it be created and asking Pelly to remind him of the appropriate protocol for applying for such positions.
